text: Daughters-Mothers () is a 1974 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergey Gerasimov.Гениальные, но забытые советские фильмы, которые стоит посмотретьДОЧКИ-МАТЕРИ (1974) It stars Innokentiy Smoktunovsky, Tamara Makarova, and Sergey Gerasimov. == Actors == * Innokentiy Smoktunovsky as Vadim Antonovich Vasilyev * Tamara Makarova as Yelena Alekseyevna Vasilyeva * Sergey Gerasimov as Pyotr Vorobyov * Lyubov Polekhina as Olga Vasileyeva * Svetlana Smekhnova as Anya Vasilyeva * Larisa Udovichenko as Galya Vasilyeva * Zura Kipshidze as Rezo == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: Daughters-Mothers
